actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to construct, operate, and maintain the Tualatin second phase reclamation project, Oreg.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to construct, operate, and maintain the Tualatin Second Phase reclamation project, Oregon, to consist of a dam and reservoir on the Tualatin River. Authorizes the appropriation of $78,334,000 to carry out the provisions of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to construct, operate, and maintain the Tualatin second phase reclamation project, Oreg.
